name: Shamol84.GitHub.io
body:
####Hello! Welcome to my website. I am Mohammad Akram Hossain, a Ph.D. student at the department of Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering at Case Western Reserve University.

My research interest includes data mining, machine learning, predictive modeling big data, ensemble, time-series analysis, and anomaly detection. Beside these, I have experience of working on real-world  automated data acquisition system development, in data extraction, transformation and loading with Hadoop stacks: MapReduce, Pig, Hive, Spark.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
